Title: “I’m totally screwed.” WD My Book Live users wake up to find their data deleted
Description: Storage-device maker advises customers to unplug My Book Lives from the Internet ASAP.

Title: New WinForms Default Font API: 'It Is Easy to Go Wild with This API' -- Visual Studio Magazine

Title: Developing Games on Linux: An Interview with Little Red Dog Games
Description: Little Red Dog Games is an indie game developer that primarily uses Godot to create games such as Deep Sixed, Precipice, and their latest game, Rogue State Revolution. To learn more about their...

Title: Staff Software Engineer, Graphics - Unpublished R&D Product
Description: Riot engineers bring deep knowledge of specific technical areas but also value the opportunity to work in a variety of broader domains. As a Software Engineer, you’ll dive into projects that focus on team cohesiveness and cross-team objectives.  You’ll drive engine technology and provide other engineers and technical artists with a clear illustration of extraordinary engineering.
